thread.title: Dog owners more sexually attractive than people who own cats | Metro News
thread.title_full: Dog owners more sexually attractive than people who own cats | Metro News

author: Nicole Morley For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Dog owners more sexually attractive than people who own cats | Metro News
text:
Nicole Morley for Metro.co.uk Thursday 16 Feb 2017 11:40 am Dog lovers are officially hotter than people with cats (Picture: Getty) 
The competition was tough, but the numbers are finally in. 
It’s official*, dog owners are far more attractive than people who own cats. 
*Well, according to this study of 1,000 singletons. 
The research found that 63% of people find dog owners most attractive, in comparison to 18% of totally wrong people who fancy cat owners. 
While 19% of joyless monsters didn’t find pet owners attractive in the slightest. It’s obvious, really (Picture: Getty) 
CHOOSE YOUR SIDE… 
The study, commissioned by Elite Singles, also discovered that people took pets into consideration while looking for a prospective partner. BBC just announced Father Christmas isn’t real during a live broadcast 
An enormous 72% of those questioned say they can predict how a person will act in a relationship on the basis of how they treat their pets. 
While 32% of dog owners would dump their date if they were convinced their canine companion wasn’t a fan – and 27% of cat lovers would do the same. It’s been staring us in the face all this time (Picture: Getty)
